features: Specially formulated OPTIK writing paper reduces the risk of ink bleeding through, which allows you to write on both sides of the paper.
Revolutionary FREE SCRIBZEE APP allows you to access you notes on your device wherever you are.
Stylish and durable front and back covers to protect your notes from damage.
Pack of 3 bold colors for you to color code your notes.
Aesthetic college ruled notebooks ideal for both professional office and school needs, and should be top of the list for everyone looking for cute journals for school
body.description: hamelin 1 Subject Notebooks 3 Pack. Quality OPTIK (TM) paper to smoothly write on both sides with your favorite pens and highlighter without fear that it will bleed through. FREE SCRIBZEE APP: Scan, Organize and Share your notes. Color Coordinate your classes with assorted colors. Each book have smooth , bright notebook paper, sturdy snag resistant spiral binding. 8"x10 1/2" notebook to easily fit in a backpack. Assorted pack with 3 beautiful colors to color code your classes. Micro perforation to be able cleanly remove any sheet.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 70 Sheets Each notebook contains 70 sheets / 140 pages of OPTIK PAPER, college ruled with special SCRIBZEE tags for scanning. Micro-perforated sheets help you remove your notes cleanly and effortlessly. Cover and sheets are three-hole punched to easily fit in any standard ring binder. Durable Construction Beautiful, durable, and flexible laminated covers are easy to carry and guaranteed to last all semester long. Strong single wire binding with a special wire lock ensures wire won’t come unraveled or snag your favorite sweater. Smooth OPTIK PAPER The tip of the pen glides effortlessly across the page to help perfectly define your writing. OPTIK PAPER ensures clear writing with no smudges whatever favorite pen or pencil you use. Hamelin’s proprietary paper is specially formulated not to bleed through, so go ahead write on both sides. Save up to 2x the amount of paper per notebook! Powered by SCRIBZEE Hamelin Notebooks have SUPER Powers with a free app, called SCRIBZEE. With SCRIBZEE, you can scan, organize, edit, search, email your notes, and so much more! Whether you are studying at home, at school, or both, with Hamelin notebooks and SCRIBZEE App, you never have to be left without your notes.

A Valuable 3 Pack with a sleek new look! We're thrilled to be introducing a brand new addition to the Hamelin line of notebooks. The same quality design & OPTIK PAPER that's put Hamelin on the map; now in an all new sleek design!

Amazing notebooks for anyone who loves to write ELECTRIC Blue, ICE White & RUBY Red are back in an amazing trio! With rounded edges, gorgeous matte/glossy stripes accenting the front cover, a white spiral spine helps the colors pop on these 3 bold College Ruled 1 Subject Notebooks.

Be Noteworthy RUBY Red, ELECTRIC Blue & ICE White. The Notebooks With Super Powers! An assorted 3 pack of classic colors that will fulfil your daily writing needs. This perfect set of affordable notebooks will help any writers ideas, notes and dreams to come to life. With OPTIK PAPER that allows the pen to glide effortlessly with no smudges these books will continue to enhance your writing capability. These three iconic colors will allow you to differentiate subjects and topics easily and efficiently. With the SCRIBZEE App your notebook can go with you wherever your phone can! Take studying to new limits with Hamelin's Super Powered Notebooks. #benoteworthy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got these to try out. I think that they are good notebooks with high quality pages. I use the Pilot Frixion pens with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality-Made in Spain
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for something better than the supermarket/discount store spiral notebooks, here they are. I have had to use spiral notebooks while WFH this past year, so I have tried several brands from the local sources. Finding a made in USA spiral notebook is nearly impossible, so at least these are made in the West. The paper is smooth and calendered and the line ink is water-resistant, unlike the cheapo brands. A casual spill of liquid will run off the paper. The microperf edge is clean, just hold the spiral side down as you gently pull. My only wish for this is that could be available with a hard back to support it while in an airline seat or at a crowded desk..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Ya know for just a few dollars more you can have a notebook that doesn't suck, the paper is CLEARLY superior to whatever crap you pick up at the campus bookstore, and if you're going to be using your Facebook a few times a week for the next 4 months, might as well have a nice one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great quality, weird smell
reviews.reviewText: great quality, nice thick paper. Only criticism is that all three have a weird, fishy smell to them that was apparent right when I opened them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love the paper. Makes my pen move easily and smooth on the surface. I will order these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright white paper, very resistant to bleed-through, in a set of three 70 sheet notebooks
reviews.reviewText: Ever since high school, I've used spiral-bound notebooks for all my notes. Even as a physician, I perform the vast majority of my note-writing in spiral notebooks. The trick is finding the right one. Each of the three notebooks provided in this set is identical but for the cover color - red, white, or blue. The notebooks are designed in France, made in Spain, and each one has 70 sheets. The pages have a bright white appearance with sharp red margin and blue horizontal lines. As one reviewer noted, Sharpies will bleed through - I don't know any paper that will resist a Sharpie - but everything else works just fine. The pages can be torn off along micro-perforated edges just short of the spiral. And there's the Hamelin app that allows use of Scribzee and permits word-searching within your written notes. (I use that app on my iPhone and it works quite well). I've been using Hamelin notebooks routinely for a few years now, and my only nitpicking point on these notebooks is that their covers are not quite as sturdy as I like. Every so often, I'll want to write in a notebook without having a firm surface available, so I hold the notebook in one hand while writing with the other. Here, the cover is thin enough that the notebook bends just a bit, even with all the pages in place. It's not a big deal, and I imagine this won't bother the vast majority of people (who might actually appreciate this notebook being a bit lighter in the backpack).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommended if you're using ScribZee, not recommended for general use
reviews.reviewText: So these are really nice notebooks if you plan to use the ScribZee app. There are corners on the edge of each page which are mandatory for using the app and you can't just use any notebook. The paper of these notebooks is nice and thick and is fun to write on because it's creamy and substantial, and the pen does not easily show through on the other side. The four squares in every corner are kind of annoying in my opinion but if you really want to use the scribzee app you have to get used to that.I know this is a review for the notebooks and not the ScribZee app, but I downloaded the app to try it with this notebook and I personally was not terribly impressed. It only allows you to search the title of your note pages and not your handwritten notes themselves. But if you want to wait to scan your notes to keep them on your phone then you need a notebook like this to use that app to do it.If you're not using the app, then I would not recommend these notebooks because of the four marks in the corner of each page because I find them ugly and distracting. But if you are using the app, this is otherwise a very nice set of notebooks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for organizing
reviews.reviewText: What I use these for is to organize areas in the closets, garage and under bed. I make lists of what is in each box so I can reach the items I need without searching through a bunch of them first. For instance, when the grandchildren come to visit, I have all their things in one place--but in several boxes. I select which box goes to which child, according to what's in the list. Easy peasy! There are so many uses for these handy notebooks, you could spend the day listing them. LOL.
great quality includes instructions for scanning
